title: Send BOPIS Pickup Reminder
description: A customer's 'Buy Online, Pick up In Store' order has been ready for pickup for three days but they have not collected it.

tasks.description: A system job identifies BOPIS orders that have been in 'Ready for Pickup' status for more than 72 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of orders that need a reminder.

tasks.description: For each order, the system automatically sends a reminder email or text to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A reminder is sent to the customer to collect their order.

tasks.description: The system logs that a reminder was sent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The action is logged in the order history.
